Room.Name: Marina Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the south side of Marina Circle, near the Nylandian Bay.
Room.LongDescription: Marina Circle is the first monument to greet incoming guests coming from the harbor. The Circle acts as a junction between Hillborough Way, running east, Marina Way, running north and south, and the Nylandian Bridge, heading west into the Bay, onto Catlania Island. Catlania Island is the home to the Marine Headquarters.
